summary: An ordinance agreeing to save harmless John E. Boyer, Louise H. Boyer, Arthur A. Boyer, Kate C. Boyer, Annie I. Norton, Harrison I. Norton, Sarah I. Thomson and Robert L. Thomson, from any costs whatsoever by reason of any special assessments which may hereafter be levied to pay compensation and costs, if any, of acquiring the following described tract to-wit: beginning at the Southwest corner of the Northwest quarter of section 21, township 25 north, range 4 east, W.M; thence east along the south line of said Northwest quarter a distance of 2555.69 feet; thence north a distance of 33 feet; thence west along a line parallel to said south line, a distance of 2555.69 feet; thence south a distance of 33 feet to the point of beginning.
